name: Michael Eric BALLARD, petitioner, v. PENNSYLVANIA.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

v.
PENNSYLVANIA.
attorneys: Petition for writ of certiorari to the Supreme Court of Pennsylvania, Middle District, denied. Marc Bookman, of Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, is hereby directed to file within 40 days a response to the June 2, 2014, letter filed by Michael Ballard in this matter.
casebody.head_matter:
Michael Eric BALLARD, petitioner,
v.
PENNSYLVANIA.
No. 13-9364.
Supreme Court of the United States
June 23, 2014.
Case below, 80 A.3d 380.
Petition for writ of certiorari to the Supreme Court of Pennsylvania, Middle District, denied. Marc Bookman, of Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, is hereby directed to file within 40 days a response to the June 2, 2014, letter filed by Michael Ballard in this matter.
